Posts.EditableText:
Hello,
I'm working on my first text adventure and I need advice on how to have my player get into a car( already created) and then have the car with the player move to another location I've created. any help would be appreciated.
Posts.HTML:
Hello,
I'm working on my first text adventure and I need advice on how to have my player get into a car( already created) and then have the car with the player move to another location I've created. any help would be appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: To let the player get into the car, you probably want to create an exit with its direction "in". You could also give the exit an alternate alias "car", so that the player can type "go car".
Posts.HTML: To let the player get into the car, you probably want to create an exit with its direction "in". You could also give the exit an alternate alias "car", so that the player can type "go car".
